mk.tmdb.utils

Class Log

  • java.lang.Object
    • mk.tmdb.utils.Log

  • public final class Log
extends java.lang.Object
    This class provides static methods to print to the log. To deactivate the log call the setActive(boolean) method with false as parameter. In the same way you can reactivate the log, it's enough calling the setActive(boolean) method with true as parameter
    Author:
    Mirko Polato
